trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <xref href="System.Configuration.SchemeSettingElement"></xref> objects.
The <xref:System.Configuration.SchemeSettingElementCollection> class represents the \<schemeSettings> element under the Uri section within a configuration file.

The <xref:System.Configuration.SchemeSettingElementCollection> class and the \<schemeSettings> section in a configuration file looks generic, implying that an application can specify any <xref:System.GenericUriParserOptions?displayProperty=fullName> enumeration value for any scheme.
In fact, only the <xref:System.GenericUriParserOptions?displayProperty=fullName> flag for HTTP and HTTPS schemes are supported.
All other settings are ignored.
By default, the <xref:System.Uri?displayProperty=fullName> class un-escapes percent encoded path delimiters before executing path compression.
This was implemented as a security mechanism against attacks like the following:
If this URI gets passed down to modules not handling percent encoded characters correctly, it could result in the following command being executed by the server:
For this reason, <xref:System.Uri?displayProperty=fullName> class first un-escapes path delimiters and then applies path compression.
The result of passing the malicious URL above to <xref:System.Uri?displayProperty=fullName> class constructor results in the following URI:
This default behavior can be modified to not un-escape percent encoded path delimiters using the <xref:System.Configuration.SchemeSettingElement> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Configuration.SchemeSettingElementCollection"></xref> class.
Gets the default collection type of <xref href="System.Configuration.SchemeSettingElementCollection"></xref>.
The `add`, `remove`, and `clear` directives are used to modify properties and specify new ones.
The default collection type of <xref href="System.Configuration.SchemeSettingElementCollection"></xref>.
The index of the specified <xref href="System.Configuration.SchemeSettingElement"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Configuration.SchemeSettingElement"></xref> for the specified index location.
The index of the specified <xref href="System.Configuration.SchemeSettingElement"></xref>; otherwise, -1.
Gets an item at the specified index in the <xref href="System.Configuration.SchemeSettingElementCollection"></xref> collection.

Use the <xref:System.Configuration.SchemeSettingElementCollection.Item%2A> property to get or set a specified <xref:System.Configuration.SchemeSettingElement> object contained within this <xref:System.Configuration.SchemeSettingElementCollection> class.
The index of the <xref href="System.Configuration.SchemeSettingElement"></xref> to return.
The specified <xref href="System.Configuration.SchemeSettingElement"></xref>.
The index parameter is less than zero.
-or-
The item specified by the parameter is `null` or has been removed.
Gets an item from the <xref href="System.Configuration.SchemeSettingElementCollection"></xref> collection.
The return value is `null` if the item cannot be found or has been removed.
A string reference to the <xref href="System.Configuration.SchemeSettingElement"></xref> object within the collection.
A <xref href="System.Configuration.SchemeSettingElement"></xref> object contained in the collection.
